extension.news:
v8.2.0 (2019-07-23) - Dynamic background and color. - A new time progress bar. - Introduced a new translation system for Kodi v19 (strings.po). - New controls displaying time information. - New menu of favorite channels from other plugins (You will not need to assign channel to EPG). - Built-in program title Youtube search function. - Font addon dependency installation. - Selection of your favorite group in main EPG. - Support for 4K / UHD channels.
v8.1.1 (2019-05-05) - Fix after creating favorite group, name is shown below in select control. - New control id for next program, time remaining and time passed. - Added support for EPG CZ (Czech) and US (American). - Fix for category list search.
v8.1.0 (2019-04-17) - Added ability to create favorite channel list - Fix exporting settings on Android - Fix exiting m-TVGuide while starting up - Ability to select foreign channels by group - Improved support for playlists - Fix WP Pilot service for outside Polish borders - Help section in the context menu
v8.0.3 (2019-03-01) - Fix automatic playback after running m-TVGuide - Fix with channel numbers controls
v8.0.2 (2019-02-20) - Fix for m-TVGuide and Kodi freezing while opening stream - Playlists migrated to the new category in settings - Fix for loading Franqie service streams
v8.0.1 (2019-02-09) - Fix crashing EPG - Not loading VOD streams from playlist if VOD option is disabled - New condition for closing the plugin - Stopped timer in vosd.py - Improvements
v8.0.0 (2018-12-10) - Performance stability has been improved - Program list focus on selected channel - Value error fix - Program list search fix - Removed wrong displayed language code in program list - Delayed channel auto start - Added missing focus texture after return from recordings folder - Hide OSD and playback in background have been fixed - Added two settings for exiting addon
v7.6.0 (2018-12-01) - Added channel order by number - Added channel selection by number - Added new information to the help section - Added channel playback autostart - Added information about the currently playing program in background - New Default skin - All skins have been reworked - Removed known bugs - Added extended information about programs - Rebuild of category colors settings, translations added - Prepared addon for Kodi v18
[COLOR grey][I]New instalation requires have also been added - script.module.requests - script.extendedinfo[/I][/COLOR]
